channel.title: I may sound like a noob when I ask this, but I am
channel.description: How do you insert codes and such?? I really want to edit a server but I can't.

item.title: I may sound like a noob when I ask this, but I am
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

sir rune:

How do you insert codes and such?? I really want to edit a server but I can’t.

Question is do you really want to make a server?

ROFL I hardly talk to my family and friends since I started.

item.title: I may sound like a noob when I ask this, but I am
item.description:
@127.0.0.1 wrote:

[quote=“O M G, post:6, topic:85045”]No no… There will be PLENTY of questions like that

IE> What’s a Hamachi?

(That used to be my sig :P)

Sir Rune, read The Ultimate Server Guide[/quote]
ha i had one to… this dude was askin for servers and a dude respawned uranoob.no-ip.org and the topic starter asked… whats port? it was soo funny (it really wasnt a server)

Read full topic

item.title: I may sound like a noob when I ask this, but I am
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

sir rune:

How do you insert codes and such?? I really want to edit a server but I can’t.

Open which file or notepad you wish to modify and by that inserting the codes from tutorials or the one’s you made, i reccomend you make a copy of the file or notepad you are going to modify if you make a mistake you’ll have a backup.

Read full topic
